name: FreeCAD Backup Document
summary: Learn about .FCSTD1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The FCSTD file is the native file format used to save designs made in FreeCAD. You can set the number of backup files that are automatically generated by FreeCAD in the program preferences. The first backup is stored in the FCSTD1 file, the second backup is saved in the FCSTD2 file, and so on. FCSTD1 files are often found accompanying the FCSTD file for which they contain a backup.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
